project.description: Testing the The Rabix Executor workflow executor against the CWL v1.0 conformance suite.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cloneorpull() { if test -d $1 ; then rm -r $1 fi git clone $2 } venv() { if ! test -d $1 ; then virtualenv $1 fi . $1/bin/activate } cloneorpull common-workflow-language https://github.com/common-workflow-language/common-workflow-language.git #cloneorpull common-workflow-language https://github.com/rabix/common-workflow-language.git #cloneorpull cwltest https://github.com/common-workflow-language/cwltest.git venv cwltool-venv #(. cwltool-venv/bin/activate && PIP_DOWNLOAD_CACHE=/var/lib/jenkins/pypi-cache/ pip install "cwltest>=1.0.20160825151655") (. cwltool-venv/bin/activate && pip install -U setuptools wheel pip) (. cwltool-venv/bin/activate && pip install -U "cwltest>=1.0.20170809112706")
#mvn clean package -P draft-2 #tar xzf rabix-backend-local/target/rabix-backend-local-0.6.1-SNAPSHOT-id3.tar.gz #set +e #(. cwltool-venv/bin/activate && cd common-workflow-language && ./run_test.sh --junit-xml=result.xml RUNNER=../rabix DRAFT=draft-2) || /bin/true #set -e
#mvn clean package -P draft-3 #tar xzf rabix-backend-local/target/rabix-backend-local-0.6.1-SNAPSHOT-id3.tar.gz #set +e #(. cwltool-venv/bin/activate && cd common-workflow-language && ./run_test.sh --junit-xml=result.xml RUNNER=../rabix DRAFT=draft-3) || /bin/true #set -e
mvn clean package -P cwl tar xzf rabix-cli/target/rabix-cli-*-release.tar.gz set +e LC_ALL=C LANG=C (. cwltool-venv/bin/activate && export DOCKER_HOST="unix:///var/run/docker.sock" \ && cd common-workflow-language && ./run_test.sh --junit-xml=result.xml \ RUNNER=../rabix-cli-*/rabix -j2) || /bin/true set -e
